synopsis.text: The anime "Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai!" released a series of 24 short, 30-second video clips to promote their upcoming theatrical film "Take On Me." Shared through the official Twitter account, these comedic vignettes offer background on the characters and story world. Though brief, the mini episodes aim to garner interest for the movie by revisiting the charm of the popular franchise. Fans can look forward to seeing their favorite delusional high schoolers back in action when "Take On Me" hits theaters.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
